title: Vanderpump Rules' Reunion Trailer Gets Dramatic AF As Scheana Marie Accuses Estranged Husband Mike Shay Of Cheating!
text:
After a pretty lackluster season, Vanderpump Rules FINALLY looks juicy again -- and it's all thanks to the upcoming reunion special!
It looks like Scheana Marie will be SURving up some dramatic realness as she has come face-to-face with her estranged husband, Mike Shay . In case you forgot, the twosome called it quits on their marriage back in November after the reality TV vet accused the DJ of cleaning out their bank account .
Related: Lala Kent Regrets Some Of Her Plastic Surgery! 
Obviously things got emotional, as the filming of this reunion was the first time the SUR server was able to confront her soon-to-be ex since wrapping season five. Not to mention, in the sneak peek (below), Scheana accuses Mike of cheating on her. *Gasp*
Of course, that's not the only drama teased in the trailer as the reunion is airing in three parts. Be sure to ch-ch-check it out for yourself (below)! 
Will YOU be watching part one of the reunion when it airs on Bravo on April 3?? Be sure to let us know (below)!
